text: The flag of Spain () has three horizontal stripes of red, yellow and red. It is also known as la Rojigualda. It was adopted 19 December 1981. == History == File:Pendón heráldico de los Reyes Catolicos de 1475-1492.svg| Pennant of the Catholic Monarchs (until 1492) File:Royal Banner of the Crown of Castile (Early Style)-Variant.svg| Standard of the Crown of Castile File:Royal Banner of Aragón.svg| Standard of the Crown of Aragon == Other flags == ==References== Spain Category:Flags of Spain Category:Bicolour flags Spain
title: Flag of Spain
